title.narrative: TV: Telecommunications and ICT Development Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to facilitate improved access to, and reduced cost of, internet services in Tuvalu.

condition.narrative: The MCT shall maintain a Project Management Unit (PMU) acceptable to the Association: FA Schedule 2, Section I B.
